result.markdown: --- title: "_brand.yml for styling your blog and Python output" date: "2025-09-23" author: "Charlotte Hadley" categories: [styling, code] --- You might want to use custom colours in HTML ::: {#0ee57118 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} from brand_yml import Brand brand = Brand.from_yaml("../../_brand.yml") brand.color.palette['story-primary'] ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` '#EB526F' ``` ::: ::: Red isn't a great background colour.
